About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself...

In the past year, I have completed a comprehensive Java full-stack development course. Once completed, I kept studying to fulfill my goal of becoming a computer programmer. As part of my learning process I took online courses in web development; I made sure to take time to learn extensively about it so I can understand web-dev inside and out. Doing so sharpened my previously learned skills while enhancing my overall knowledge of programming.

I strongly believe in my methods and have faith that I could be a valuable asset to any team while continuing to hone my skills and to be an adept programmer.
